title: Jhin Cant Count
body: I find that it is really annoying when Jhin shouts "Three!" but I actually canceled the auto and I think I have four shots up but I don't.

replies.body: Jhin demands perfection, and auto cancelling is not.
Well if you cancel the auto, then shouldn't you notic an auto not going and know that the three aint  there? Also {{champion:82}} can make him count four on every auto.
Obviously, you have 6 upvotes. Stop Confusing him.
Good point, I'm sure Riot can easily fix that.

> [{quoted}](name=SkyeMoon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XJRaofvA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-15T17:23:03.117+0000)
>
> Good point, I'm sure Riot can easily fix that.

I Bet They Wont
Was that really necessary? Every patch has a billion bugfixes

>
> Was that really necessary? Every patch has a billion bugfixes
:D
Same thing for {{champion:240}} 's 4 auto's I hear 3 autos go off but turns out the first one wasn't empowered, so I have to wait for 1 more to get 4th.
